description: object definitions used in message exchange with distributors only

CalendarDef.description: valid on all days in case no calendar is provided

dates.description: dates included in the calendar. In case no dates are provided the entire range is assumed to be valid

UTCoffset.description: offsett to UTC in minutes (number of minutes to be added to get UTC dates)

CompanyDef.description: RICS company code or the upcoming compatible ERA company code. In case proprietary codes are used on a bilateral base the codes must have at least 5 positions and start with x

CountryDef.description: ISO 3166 2A codes, optional in case of web sales

FulfillmentTypeDef.description: SIP - secure paper tickets; SID - security in data (signed bar code); SIS - security in system

system.description: geo coordinate system indication: wgs84 = WGS 84 standard system, grs80 = (outdated) GRS 80 coordinate system

StationCodeListDef.description: code list used for the station codes: UIC = UIC codes as used by merits (UIC country code + local code) = Default// UIC-R = UIC codes for reservation (UIC country code + local code reservation) // ERA = future ERA station code

ServiceBrandAbbreviationDef.description: Abbreviation of the service brand to be printed on tickets

ServiceBrandCodeDef.description: Service brand code, code list published on UIC web site

ServiceBrandDescriptionDef.description: Service brand text to be printed on the ticket

abbreviation.description: The abbreviation has to be included if there is an abbreviation defined for the service brand.

code.description: service btrand code according to the UIC service brand code list

description.description: The description text has to be included if the service brand has defined a description text for printing.

ServiceClassIdDef.description: Service class id. Values according to code list IRS 90918-10  (A,B,C,D)

ServiceLevelIdDef.description: code of the servi9ce level, codelist in IRS 90918-1

TravelerTypeDef.description: Values from the traveler type code list IRS 90918-10

AfterSaleReasonDef.description: reason and type for an after sale, Code list in IRS 90918-10
